definition: the young of certain carnivorous mammals such as the bear or wolf or lion, to give birth to cubs
details:
noun
- the young of certain carnivorous mammals such as the bear or wolf or lion
- a male child (a familiar term of address to a boy)
= synonyms: lad, laddie, sonny, sonny boy
- an awkward and inexperienced youth
= synonyms: greenhorn, rookie
verb
- to give birth to cubs
= example: to give birth to cubs
